abstract: American figure skater Alissa Czisny wins women's title at Skate America.
snippet: The American Alissa Czisny edged Carolina Kostner of Italy by 0.13 points to win the women’s title at Skate America in Ontario, Calif.
lead_paragraph: The American Alissa Czisny edged Carolina Kostner of Italy by 0.13 points to win the women’s title at Skate America in Ontario, Calif.

headline.main: American Wins Skate America Women’s Title
headline.print_headline: American Wins Skate America Women’s Title
